description: A list of status informations for the API and the application.

generated.description: iso8601 date time string of generation on the server

blocked.description: Number of temporary blocked appointment IDs in the database.

confirmed.description: Number of valid appointments in the database. Every process counts for the clients involved.

deleted.description: Number of deleted appointments in the database blocking free appointment times.

lastCalculate.description: Timestamp of last calculation for slots

missed.description: Number of missed appointments in the database. Zeroed on daily basis in the night.

outdated.description: Number of slots, which might change on recalculation due to changed availabilities

outdatedOldest.description: Timestamp of oldest slot for recalculation.

reserved.description: Number of reserved appointments in the database.

last.description: Last date(c) of dldb import in database.

queueCount.description: Number of unsend items in the queue

oldestSeconds.description: Unix timestamp of oldest unsend item in queue

newestSeconds.description: Unix timestamp of newest unsend item in queue

queueCount.description: Number of unsend items in the queue

oldestSeconds.description: Unix timestamp of oldest unsend item in queue

newestSeconds.description: Unix timestamp of newest unsend item in queue

locks.description: Number of locks for transactions on requested node.

nodeConnections.description: Percentage of used connections on requested node.

problems.description: List of configuration problems on requested node..

threads.description: Number of connected threads on requested node.

major.description: major version, this value increments on breaking changes

minor.description: minor version, this value increments on adding features

patch.description: patch level, this value increments with bugfixes
